description: A SCG definition is the configuration data used by the myPM SCG Classic program to process the .XLS or .XLSX data source file, populate the template file, and generate the output file. Configuration information includes project details, S curve files, S curve options, data source map, and data source filter. You can view the SCG Definition configuration data through the various tabs located on the main form.
NOTE: myPM SCG Classic requires an installation of Microsoft Excel.
